div.p: vaccineCode: influenza, injectable, quadrivalent (Details : {http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/cvx code '158' = 'influenza, injectable, quadrivalent', given as 'influenza, injectable, quadrivalent'}; {http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/ndc code '49281-0623-78' = '49281-0623-78', given as 'FLUZONE QUADRIVALENT'})
